ARABIC: هُمْ دَرَجَٰتٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرٌۢ بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They have different ranks with Allah. Allah sees what they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There are different ranks with God, And God sees everything you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They vary greatly in rank in the sight of Allah, and Allah sees what they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: People are of various grades in the sight of God. God is Well-Aware of all that they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They are in different ranks before Allah; and Allah sees their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They are in varying grades with Allah, and Allah is All-Seer of what they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: There are (varying) grades with Allah, and Allah sees what they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They are in ranks with God; and God sees the things they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: There are degrees (of grace and reprobation) with Allah, and Allah is Seer of what they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: All have a different standing in the eyes of God, and God is observant of all their actions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Of diverse degrees shall be they with Allah, and Allah is Beholder of that which they work.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They have ranks with Allah, and Allah watches what they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They are in varying gardens in the sight of Allah, and Allah sees well all that they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They are in varying grades with Allah, and Allah is All-Seer of what they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They are in ranks with Allah. Allah sees what they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They have different ranks with God, and God is Seeing of what they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They are [varying] degrees in the sight of Allah, and Allah is Seeing of whatever they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:163] No! They are of degrees, that is, individuals of [different] degrees, before God, that is, belonging to varying stations: for those that follow His beatitude, a reward, and for those that are laden with God’s anger, punishment; and God sees what they do, and will requite them for it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (There are degrees (of grace and reprobation) with Allah) He says: those who leave deceit have different ranks with Allah in Paradise; but those who deceive will occupy different levels in hell, (and Allah is Seer of what ye do) whether it is deception or other things.
